001package io.github.ai4ci.abm.policy;
002
003import static io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateUtils.branchPeopleTo;
004import static io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateUtils.randomlyScreen;
005
006import io.github.ai4ci.abm.ImmutableOutbreakHistory;
007import io.github.ai4ci.abm.ImmutableOutbreakState.Builder;
008import io.github.ai4ci.abm.ModelNav;
009import io.github.ai4ci.abm.OutbreakState;
010import io.github.ai4ci.abm.behaviour.LockdownIsolation;
011import io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.State;
012import io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateMachineContext;
013import io.github.ai4ci.util.Sampler;
014
015/**
016 * A reactive lockdown policy implementation that triggers population-wide
017 * interventions based on epidemiological thresholds.
018 *
019 * <p>
020 * This enum implements a state machine for managing lockdown policies that
021 * respond dynamically to changing outbreak conditions. The policy transitions
022 * between monitoring and lockdown states based on test positivity rates and
023 * configured threshold triggers.
024 *
025 * <h2>Policy States</h2>
026 * <ul>
027 * <li><b>MONITOR</b>: Passive surveillance state with routine population
028 * screening</li>
029 * <li><b>LOCKDOWN</b>: Active intervention state with enforced isolation
030 * measures</li>
031 * </ul>
032 *
033 * <h2>Trigger Mechanism</h2>
034 * <p>
035 * Policy transitions are triggered by comparing current outbreak metrics
036 * against configured thresholds ({@link Trigger}) with statistical confidence:
037 * <ul>
038 * <li><b>Lockdown Start</b>: Triggered when test positivity confidently exceeds
039 * the start threshold (95% confidence)</li>
040 * <li><b>Lockdown Release</b>: Triggered when test positivity confidently falls
041 * below the release threshold (95% confidence)</li>
042 * </ul>
043 *
044 * <h2>Behavioral Impact</h2>
045 * <p>
046 * When lockdown is triggered, the policy forces population-wide behavior
047 * changes:
048 * <ul>
049 * <li><b>Entering Lockdown</b>: Branches all people to
050 * {@link LockdownIsolation#ISOLATE} behavior state</li>
051 * <li><b>Exiting Lockdown</b>: Branches all people to
052 * {@link LockdownIsolation#RELEASE} behavior state</li>
053 * </ul>
054 *
055 * <h2>Screening Strategy</h2>
056 * <p>
057 * Both policy states perform routine population screening to monitor outbreak
058 * progression and inform policy decisions.
059 *
060 * @see LockdownIsolation
061 * @see io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateUtils#branchPeopleTo
062 * @see io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateUtils#randomlyScreen
063 * @see PolicyModel
064 */
065public enum ReactiveLockdown implements PolicyModel {
066
067        /**
068         * Monitoring state that performs routine population screening and evaluates
069         * whether to trigger lockdown based on test positivity thresholds.
070         *
071         * <p>
072         * In this state:
073         * <ul>
074         * <li>Routine screening tests are conducted across the population</li>
075         * <li>Test positivity rates are monitored continuously</li>
076         * <li>Lockdown is triggered when positivity exceeds start threshold with 95%
077         * confidence</li>
078         * </ul>
079         *
080         * <p>
081         * The trigger comparison uses statistical confidence intervals to prevent
082         * premature lockdown activation due to random fluctuations in test results.
083         */
084        MONITOR {
085
086                @Override
087                public State.PolicyState nextState(
088                                Builder builder, OutbreakState current, StateMachineContext context,
089                                Sampler rng
090                ) {
091                        if (current.getLockdownTrigger().confidentlyGreaterThan(
092                                        ModelNav.modelParam(current).getLockdownStartTrigger(), 0.95
093                        )) {
094                                branchPeopleTo(current, LockdownIsolation.ISOLATE);
095                                return LOCKDOWN;
096                        }
097                        return MONITOR;
098                }
099
100                @Override
101                public void updateHistory(
102                                ImmutableOutbreakHistory.Builder builder, OutbreakState current,
103                                StateMachineContext context, Sampler rng
104                ) {
105                        randomlyScreen(current, rng);
106                }
107        },
108
109        /**
110         * Active lockdown state that enforces population-wide isolation measures and
111         * evaluates whether to release based on improving epidemiological
112         * conditions.
113         *
114         * <p>
115         * In this state:
116         * <ul>
117         * <li>Routine screening continues to monitor outbreak progression</li>
118         * <li>Population-wide isolation behavior is enforced</li>
119         * <li>Lockdown is released when positivity falls below release threshold
120         * with 95% confidence</li>
121         * </ul>
122         *
123         * <p>
124         * The release condition ensures lockdowns are maintained until there is
125         * statistical confidence that the outbreak has sufficiently subsided.
126         */
127        LOCKDOWN {
128
129                @Override
130                public State.PolicyState nextState(
131                                Builder builder, OutbreakState current, StateMachineContext context,
132                                Sampler rng
133                ) {
134                        if (current.getLockdownTrigger().confidentlyLessThan(
135                                        ModelNav.modelParam(current).getLockdownReleaseTrigger(), 0.95
136                        )) {
137                                branchPeopleTo(current, LockdownIsolation.RELEASE);
138                                return MONITOR;
139                        }
140                        return LOCKDOWN;
141                }
142
143                @Override
144                public void updateHistory(
145                                ImmutableOutbreakHistory.Builder builder, OutbreakState current,
146                                StateMachineContext context, Sampler rng
147                ) {
148                        randomlyScreen(current, rng);
149                }
150        };
151
152}
